column5: Getting around to renewing my license. The Transport Canada site says only boats bought after 2010.  	So my 2007 doesn’t require renewal then?
if you are the owner since 2007 or last person to update it before 2010 you should be good. I got my boat in 2011 and have had to update mine once already. they sent me a notice in the mail
Only if you change your address or other pertinent info listed on the paper.  Otherwise you're good.
